channel.title: Setup | KubeDB on Run production-grade databases easily on Kubernetes
channel.description: Recent content in Setup | KubeDB on Run production-grade databases easily on Kubernetes

item.title: Table of Contents | Setup
item.description: Setup Setup contains instructions for installing the KubeDB to work with database objects. KubeDB operator Install KubeDB operator. Installation instructions for KubeDB operator. Uninstall KubeDB operator. Instructions for uninstallating KubeDB operator. Kubectl Plugin Install Kubectl Plugin. Installation instructions for KubeDB kubectl plugin. Developer Guide Overview. Outlines everything you need to know from setting up your dev environment to how to build and test KubeDB operator.
